text.author: Wikinews
text.title: FIFA World Cup 2018 day five: Sweden, Belgium, England win three points
text.summary: On day 5 of the 2018 FIFA World Cup, Sweden defeated South Korea 1–0, Belgium defeated Panama 3–0 and Tunisia lost 1–2 to England, earning the winning teams three points each.
